DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy of gefitinib versus pemetrexed as second-line chemotherapy for patients with previous treated non-small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Gefitinib Versus Pemetrexed for Previously Treated NSCLC Patients
DOC.criteria: Cells pathologically diagnosed as histological or radical surgery or radiation therapy is not possible stage IIIB and stage IV nonsmallcell lung cancer patients second line ECOG 0ï½ž2 Patients with normal liver function and renal function Patients with severe acute infection requiring antibiotic therapy Patients who have received treatment in other areas of cancer within 5 years During pregnancy and lactation patients
